text: I feel like I fear losing love in my relationships.
I feel like I fear receiving love, even when it's offered to me.
I can accept and receive love without fear or anxiety.
I experience anxiety about losing love, which affects my relationships.
I can maintain relationships without constantly fearing that I'll lose love.
